kw.name: List Articles
kw.doc: This function lists limited nu ber of articles controlled by argument limit :param limit: No of items to be returned :param auth_user: username for Basic Auth :param auth_pwd: Password for Basic Auth :return: returns a dictionary of articles

test.name: Create A New Article

kw.name: Create New Article
kw.doc: This keyword creates a new article

kw.name: Create Article
kw.doc: This function will create a new article :param title: title of the article :param description: description of the article :param body: body of the article :param taglist: list of tags :param email: login email Id :param password: password to login :param auth_user: username for Basic Auth :param auth_pwd: Password for Basic Auth :return: returns created article details in a dictionary

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Validate Created Article
kw.doc: This keyword validates the content of article created

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.arg: msg=title is not present for new article created
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.arg: msg=title is not present for new article created
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.arg: msg=title is not present for new article created
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key

kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.doc: Sets the timeout used by most input and getter keywords.

kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.

kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.

kw.doc: This keyword validates tile of the home page

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: When Open Sign In Page
kw.doc: This keyword will click on sign In link in conduit home page

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Wait for Element with selector: //a[contains(text(),'Sign in')]

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Then Validate Login Url
kw.doc: This keyword validates tile of the home page

kw.name: Get Url
kw.doc: Returns the current URL.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: And Enter Sign In Email Id
kw.doc: This keyword enter email id for sign in

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'qatestuser@gmail.com' in the given field.

kw.name: And Enter Sign In Password
kw.doc: This keyword enter password for sign in

kw.name: Fill Secret
kw.doc: Fills the given secret from ``variable_name`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.doc: This keyword clicks on the sign in button

kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.doc: This keyword verifies whether sign in is successfull or not

kw.arg: message=An Error Occurred!. Email or password is invalid.
kw.doc: Returns the current URL.
